name: Seattle Collision Heatmap
description: A thematic heatmap showcasing the frequency of vehicle collisions in Seattle, providing insights into the number of injuries caused by each collision.

name: Earthquake Risk StoryMap
description: A comprehensive ArcGIS StoryMap educating the public about earthquake risks in California. Utilized a 3D web scene and interactive dashboard to dynamically display various earthquake statistics.

name: Bike Rack Locator
description: React web application integrating mapping functionality to display locations of bike racks within Seattle. Utilized Firebase Hosting and Firebase Realtime Database to enhance user interaction through seamless data updates and synchronization.
